Text:
Review Courtesy of IAFD:  

 Ariana Jolie, the director and gal on the front DVD cover, reserved the last spot for herself as she teased in her orange fishnet outfit and stripper shoes in a garage. While she had masturbated throughout the scenes and even slightly participated in them, she was never allowed to give her all as she was here with Brian Surewood, Tony T., and Otto Bauer. Granted, I've never thought highly of the last two men but if anyone could put them in their place; it would be Ariana. She blew them in turn as they circled around her and they rode her other holes as if taking advantage of a once in a lifetime opportunity with plenty of energy. She did all the usual circus act tricks, including DAP (double anal penetration) and taste testing with a glee reserved for only the best performers in the business. They blew loads all over her face (or the car where she licked it clean) and the movie ended on a high note.
thanks for the nice posts!!! greetings
